Sea Dragon Point0694732owwqhhjel223jtfqy66pg9xaqmg5z1197472014-03-28T02:32:11ZGreater good3347453/* See also */[[Image:Sea Dragon Point.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Sea Dragon Point on the continent of Westeros.]]

'''Sea Dragon Point''' is a large peninsula in [[the North]]. It extends northwards, separating the [[Bay of Ice]] to the east from the [[Sunset Sea]] in the west. It is located west of the [[Wolfswood]]. The nearest major castle is [[Deepwood Motte]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/bear-island/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Bear Island entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Sea Dragon Point is in the same location.
